postCreateCommand: composer create-project laravel/laravel ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/tmp && mv -f ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/tmp/{.,}* . && rm -rf ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/tmp && mv -f ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/devcontainer-postinstall.json ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/.devcontainer/devcontainer.json
